pages.text: Aloe Vera plants spawn in dry and arid biomes.
Blood Orchids spawn in Jungle Biomes.
Chamomile spawns in plains biomes, forest biomes, and swamp biomes.
Cloud Lilies spawn in mountainous biomes. It is edible and has a levitation effect upon consumption.
Horsetail spawns in Jungle, Swamp, Plains, and Forest biomes.
Wind Thistle spawns in mountain and plains biomes. Thistles hurt and inflict pain when contacted.
Nightshrooms spawn in jungle biomes and caves.
Green Spored Asbestos spawns in the nether.
Core Root is an edible root that spawns in caves.
Ginseng is an edible root that spawns in plains and forests.
Marshmallow Root is an edible root that spawns in the jungle and swamp.
